data.title: Data
data.description:
The CZML data, represented as a binary Blob, JSON object literal, or a Promise for one of those things.
If this property is set, CatalogItem's url is ignored.

dataSourceUrl.title: Data source URL
dataSourceUrl.description:
The URL from which the CzmlCatalogItem's data was obtained.  This will be used
to resolve any resources linked in the CZML file, if any.
